channel.title: CVE Feed for 389 Directory Server -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 389 Directory Server -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-7551|2024-08-05T16:04:11.925Z -- 389%20directory%20server -- 389-ds-base
item.description: 389-ds-base version before 1.3.5.19 and 1.3.6.7 are vulnerable to password brute-force attacks during account lockout due to different return codes returned on password attempts.
